channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 11:26 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.
item.description: 游릭 11:26 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 10:12 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community and Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
